titleStmt.title: A sermon preach'd in the Cathedral-Church at Ely, July the 24th, 1698 on occasion of His Majesty's proclamation against atheism, and profaneness, &c / by Charles Lidgould ...
titleStmt.author: Lidgold, Charles, d. 1701.
